net.sf.hibernate.dialect
Class SAPDBDialect

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.hibernate.dialect.Dialect
      net.sf.hibernate.dialect.SAPDBDialect
public class SAPDBDialect
extends Dialect

An SQL dialect compatible with SAP DB.

Author:
Brad Clow
